column2:
"Phew, that was a close one! I mean, what the heck was that, anyway?
I've never seen a Mech like that."

"I wonder if that's why I was feeling all weirded out. Hm...
No, I don't think that was the only reason, but... hm..."
"Aw man, this is driving me crazy! But I don't think we should hang around here much longer. Let's bail, okay?"
